snippet: Pope Benedict XVI has named Ernst von Freyberg, a German aristocrat and industrialist, as the new head of the Vatican Bank, reducing the Italian presence there.
abstract: Pope Benedict XVI names Ernst von Freyberg, German aristocrat and industrialist, as head of Vatican Bank, reducing Italian presence in secretive institution that has struggled to restore its credibility and meet international transparency norms.

byline.contributor: Gaia Pianigiani contributed reporting from Vatican City.

lead_paragraph: Pope Benedict XVI has named Ernst von Freyberg, a German aristocrat and industrialist, as the new head of the Vatican Bank, reducing the Italian presence there.

headline.seo: Pope Names Von Freyberg to Head Vatican Bank
headline.main: Pope Names German Industrialist to Head Vatican Bank
headline.print_headline: Pope Names German Industrialist to Head Vatican Bank
